version_description:
New feature: Notification pop-up when your recording has finished processing. After the call finished you will be notified in the moment when the recording is available for listening.
Call Recorder is also getting performance update, various bug fixes and stability improvements.
Call Recorder is getting performance update, various bug fixes and stability improvements. We updated on-boarding flow to make accessing the app more seamless.

Call Recorder is getting performance update, various bug fixes and stability improvements. We updated on-boarding internet connection check to make the user experience more seamless. Small issues with recording playback is also fixed.
Call Recorder is getting performance update, various bug fixes and stability improvements. We updated the call recording notification delivery, improved general flow and feel of the app.
Call Recorder is getting performance update, various bug fixes and stability improvements. We updated the onboarding flow, improved general look and feel of the app.
Call Recorder is getting performance update, various bug fixes and stability improvements. We updated the onboarding flow, improved general look and feel of the app.
